column4: I can't mount my USB HDD because it was not properly realeased from a Windows machine..... what now?
I have no Windows PC here
what filesystem is on your USB drive?
and you can't just mount it?
are you trying from ze shell?
I already did  sudo mount -t ntfs-3g /dev/sdb1 /media/disk -o force
but all I get is fuse: failed to access mountpoint /media/disk: No such file or directory
well, that would be your problem, dummy
you can't mount if there's no mount point
yeah go ahead and make it
oh thanks.... I don't appreciate being called a dummy... even if I may seem like one
sorry, friend, just some gentle ribbing
